Map By Linyan.Translation: Map By Linyan, EN Translation: Allenw @ Ozlin Server

整个设施陷入了半停电状态.Translation: The entire facility has fallen into a partial blackout

识别代码为K-A18 代号：僵尸.Translation: Identification code is K-A18, Codename: Zombie

如遇到有症状人员，可就地击毙.Translation: If symptomatic individuals are encountered, they may be executed on site

看来事情有点大啊.Translation: Looks like this is a big deal

给我30秒打开门.Translation: Give me 30 seconds to open the door

靠，开门的噪声引来了僵尸.Translation: Damn, the noise of opening the door attracted zombies

门开了，快走.Translation: The door is open, hurry up

这边被大火封路了......Translation: This side is blocked by fire.....

来这边！有电梯可以到上一层.Translation: Come over here! There's an elevator to the upper level

不过我们需要扑灭火焰.Translation: But we need to extinguish the flames

小心，僵尸扒开了大门.Translation: Be careful, zombies pried open the door

守住阵地，还有30秒扑灭火焰.Translation: Hold the position, 30 seconds left to extinguish the flames

僵尸从另一个大门涌来了.Translation: Zombies are pouring in from another gate

小心从另一边房间来的僵尸.Translation: Be careful of zombies coming from the other room

电梯大门将在20秒后开启.Translation: The elevator door will open in 20 seconds

电梯大门将在5秒后关闭.Translation: The elevator door will close in 5 seconds

呼，终于摆脱掉这些僵尸了.Translation: Phew, finally got rid of those zombies

大门将在10秒后开启，坚守阵地.Translation: The main door will open in 10 seconds, hold your ground

小心侧面僵尸.Translation: Watch out for zombies on the side

门将在20秒后开启，坚守阵地.Translation: The door will open in 20 seconds, hold your ground

僵尸扒开了铁网，小心左边.Translation: Zombies have torn through the wire mesh, watch the left side

门将在20秒后开启.Translation: The door will open in 20 seconds

僵尸从侧面大门涌来了.Translation: Zombies are pouring in from the side door

大门将在40秒后开启.Translation: The main door will open in 40 seconds

木门将在30秒后打开.Translation: The wooden door will open in 30 seconds

怎么又是死路.Translation: Why is it a dead end again

10秒后墙壁破碎.Translation: The wall will break in 10 seconds

.......发生了不明类型灾害.Translation: .......An unidentified type of disaster has occurred

各类供电与通讯系统严重损坏或失效.Translation: Various power and communication systems are severely damaged or non-functional

现在已对当前地区实施全面隔离检疫.Translation: The current area has now been placed under full quarantine

为了安全起见 建议收听到此广播的人员立即撤离.Translation: For safety reasons, it is recommended that anyone hearing this broadcast evacuate immediately

请遵循人员手册所标注的疏散路线.Translation: Please follow the evacuation routes marked in the personnel manual

如果你出现发烧、咳嗽、恶心、气喘、皮肤脱落或任何类似症状.Translation: If you experience fever, coughing, nausea, shortness of breath, skin peeling, or any similar symptoms

请立即报告给随行的军官、警察或安保人员.Translation: Please report immediately to an accompanying officer, police, or security personnel

因为这些症状可能与最近的事件有关.Translation: As these symptoms may be related to recent events

给我10秒打开大门.Translation: Give me 10 seconds to open the main door

给我点时间开门.Translation: Give me some time to open the door

该死的，疏散路线的这个门怎么开不了.Translation: Damn, this door on the evacuation route won't open

让我看看手册......靠，没路走了.Translation: Let me check the manual... Damn, there's no way through

我知道这边有个管道，不过不知道是去哪的.Translation: I know there's a pipe here, but I'm not sure where it leads

算了，走一步看一步了.Translation: Forget it, we'll take it one step at a time

这边漏电了....让我想想办法.Translation: There's an electrical leak here... Let me figure something out

电将在10秒后切断.Translation: The power will be cut off in 10 seconds

电源已切断.Translation: The power has been cut off

梯子将在10秒后开放.Translation: The ladder will be accessible in 10 seconds

杂物将在20秒后摧毁.Translation: Debris will be cleared in 20 seconds

大门将在30秒后开启.Translation: The main door will open in 30 seconds

正在想办法打开铁丝网.Translation: Trying to figure out how to open the wire mesh
